index.title: Backend Developer | Java & Spring Boot
index.description: I am a backend developer with 3 years of experience in Java. I focus on creating RESTful APIs using the Spring Boot framework, with data persistence in relational databases like PostgreSQL and H2 DataBase. I am familiar with good development practices such as SOLID principles, automated testing with JUnit, and code versioning with Git. Currently, I am expanding my knowledge beyond backend by studying HTML and CSS to better understand how the presentation layer works and how it communicates with the APIs I develop. This journey is helping me build complete projects, even if simple, and improve my overall web development vision.

about.descriptionP1: I am driven by challenges and continuous learning. After a solid career in public security, I shifted my focus to software development, with an emphasis on backend Java and building RESTful APIs using Spring Boot.
about.descriptionP2: I am currently pursuing a degree in Software Engineering at USF (Universidade São Francisco), having already completed two years at Universidade Cruzeiro do Sul (EAD). I have been dedicating myself to study projects involving PostgreSQL, H2 Database, Git, HTML, and CSS, aiming to deepen my understanding of modern web application structures.
about.descriptionP3: I am preparing to work as a freelancer and expand my horizons in the international market by enhancing my technical skills and English proficiency. I am constantly evolving and seeking collaborative environments where I can grow professionally and contribute with efficient and well-structured solutions.
